title: Is there anywhere that is constantly updated that will tell me whether a program becomes disallowed?
body: I use LoLWiz and ReplayHUD (because Scarra and Dyrus do, so I assume they're allowed at the moment) and was wondering if there's a thread or something that is always up-to-date on whether a program is allowed or not. I know a lot of people have been banned for using woozy (wooxy? woodyy?) since they saw threads from 2 years ago that said it was ok.

replies.body:
Most announcements are made on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page, but I also suggest bookmarking our [Third Party Programs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)support article.  We're usually pretty good about making sure these articles are up to date.  

Generally, accounts are suspended for creating unfair advantages in-game.  Be wary about any third party programs you obtain, as it can have malicious content  hiding.  Be wary!
